short.am,ar,bn,ca,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,: Displays random masterpieces from Google Cultural Institute in your every new tab
short.bg: Показва случайни шедьоври от Културния институт на Google във всеки нов раздел
short.cs: Zobrazuje náhodná mistrovská díla z Kulturního institutu Google na každé nové kartě.
short.da: Viser tilfældige mesterværker fra Google Cultural Institute i hver ny fane
short.de: Zeigt zufällige Meisterwerke aus dem Google Cultural Institute in jeder neuen Registerkarte an
short.el: Εμφανίζει τυχαία αριστουργήματα από το Πολιτιστικό Ινστιτούτο της Google σε κάθε νέα καρτέλα σας
short.es: Muestra obras maestras aleatorias del Instituto Cultural de Google en cada nueva pestaña
short.et: Kuvab igas uues vahekaardis Google'i kultuuriinstituudi juhuslikke meistriteoseid
short.fi: Näyttää satunnaisia mestariteoksia Googlen kulttuuri-instituutista jokaisessa uudessa välilehdessäsi.
short.fr: Affiche des chefs-d'œuvre aléatoires de l'Institut culturel de Google dans chaque nouvel onglet.
short.hu: Megjeleníti a Google Kulturális Intézet véletlenszerű remekműveit minden új lapodon
short.it: Mostra capolavori casuali del Google Cultural Institute in ogni nuova scheda
short.ja: Google Cultural Instituteの名作をランダムに表示します。
short.nl: Toont willekeurige meesterwerken van Google Cultural Institute in elk nieuw tabblad
short.ru: Отображает случайные шедевры из Института культуры Google в каждой новой вкладке.
short.zh_CN: 在你的每个新标签中显示来自谷歌文化研究所的随机杰作

long.am,ar,bn,ca,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,:
This extension replaces the default "New Tab" page with a clean and organized page showcasing a wide range of masterpieces, from renowned artists like Van Gogh and Monet to contemporary works by street artists worldwide.

Key Points:
1. The extension utilizes the Google Arts & Culture database to display these artworks. Each artwork includes clickable titles and links to the creators.
2. The extension stores up to 5 artworks in the browser's cache storage to improve responsiveness.
3. All new artworks are fetched directly from the Google Arts & Culture website.
4. Each artwork is displayed for 24 hours before being replaced with a new one. If you don't like a particular one, you can use the refresh button to see a different random artwork.

What is the "Google Arts & Culture" service (from Wikipedia)?
Google Arts & Culture features content from over 2000 prominent museums and archives partnered with the Google Cultural Institute to bring the world's treasures online. It uses high-resolution image technology, allowing users to explore partner organizations' collections, and galleries, and access detailed information about the artworks. The platform also offers advanced search capabilities and educational tools.

-- Legal
This extension solely retrieves resources from Google Arts & Culture. It is an independent project without affiliation with Google or the Google Arts & Culture team.
long.bg,cs,da,de,el,es,et,fi,fr,hu,it,ja,nl,r:
This extension overwrites the default "new tab" page with a simple page that displays a masterpiece ranging from Van Gogh and Monet, all the way to contemporary works from street artists around the world. 

Note: this extension uses the Google Arts & Culture database for displaying these artworks. Each artwork has a clickable title and creator links. 
Note: To increasing loading speed, the extension stores up to 2 artworks in the browser storage. All new artworks are being fetched from the Google Arts & Culture website.
Note: each artwork is displayed for 24 hours and then will be replaced with a new one. If you happen not to like one, use the refresh button to get a new random artwork from the Google Arts & Culture database.

Legal: this extension only fetches the resources from Google Arts & Culture. This is an independent project and has no relation with Google or Google Arts & Culture team.
